summary: Iteration 3 testing completed successfully. CRITICAL FIX VERIFIED: Paper 2 submission navigation button now working perfectly. All features tested: student Paper 2 submission flow (navigation, file upload), teacher marking workflow (skill scoring, feedback, save/finalize), and language toggle. Backend APIs 100% functional (18/18 tests passed). Frontend features 100% working.
